description: The heroes at The Gyro Shack have been impressing Boise foodies with their knack for wrapping up the tastiest gyros for years. Now they’re taking the Greek to the streets and our lives feel complete. Only the freshest ingredients are used to make this fantastic selection of Gyros; juicy gyro meat, freshly sliced tomatoes, and the homemade Tzatziki sauce makes this classic dish unbelievably delicious. You’ll want to try The Ultimate: gyro meat, chicken, bacon, tzatziki sauce, homemade hummus, lettuce, tomato, grilled onion, peperoncini, kalamata olives, serrano peppers, feta cheese, and spicy sauce. Don’t be surprised when you find yourself coming back to The Gyro Shack, because who doesn’t need wonderfully unique Greek cuisine?
name: The Gyro Shack
